timeline.author: jonmv

timeline.message: Move MockMetric to jdisc_core test package

timeline.bodyText: In all backend metrics this dimension is named "documenttype". We should use the same her I guess.
timeline.author: geirst

replies.bodyText: Geir is correct. The dimension name must be exactly "documenttype", or it cannot be used in combination with other metrics. The option would likely be to replicated "documenttype" into "documentType" for all other metrics having this already, if we conclude "documentType" is the better name.
replies.author: yngveaasheim

timeline.message: Defensively copy given properties in MockMetric
